title: Waterproof Phone Pouch, 2 Pack Black Water Proof Cell Phone Case, Phone Wet Dry Bag Holder Beach Vacation Waterpark Underwater Cruise Essentials Accessories Must Haves Packing List Stuff for Men Women
description: PACKAGING: You will get two phone waterproof pouches, 4.2 inches x 8.2 inches, suitable for most mobile phones with or without cases, providing double insurance for your mobile phone DESIGN: Phone waterproof bag pouch opening with manual sealing device, good sealing effect. The bag itself is transparent and made of upgraded TPU material, support touch screen and fingerprint unlock face unlock etc, responsive VACATION ESSENTIALS: With 3-layer dustproof technology, it provides full waterproof, snowproof, dustproof and sandproof protection. Make sure your phone stays dry WITH LENDER: Comes with a detachable lanyard that is approximately 17 inches in length, making it easy to hang your phone around your neck TRAVEL MUST HAVE: Ideal companion for a variety of activities such as beach fun, water parks, swimming, snorkelling, kayaking, rafting, or even taking a shower with your phone
